title: Ravenborn Leblanc - Animation - Collar Clipping in Recall
body:
http://imgur.com/MVlaxJz

I honestly thought this would be addressed, however since this is a legacy skin - most people don't have it unless they are avid Leblanc players.

I figured I would report this clipping bug, it really is distracting and unpleasent when she is recalling, facing away from the camera to see the **Entire** back of her head when she recalls.

This skin has been out for two years and hasn't had that horrible clip fixed? It really, **REALLY** is noticeable, its not some small clip, it is an animation error and I am not sure why it wasn't fixed before the skin was released? 

Could someone at Riot please check the status if this is a known bug and if it will be fixed soon? When the new Leblanc skin comes out, it would be cool to get a bug fix for Ravenborn as well! :)

replies.body:
Hey CRYSTAL MAlDEN - 

Thanks for the report! 

I took a look at the issue, and it appears to be trivial, as compared to other bugs on our plate at the moment - especially those for skins releasing next patch. That said, I did log the issue in the database, and it will be prioritized and resolved - just not immediately.

Bump? I don't know if you can bump here but it's basically fallen to the third page!

I don't know why I am so bothered by this clip, its just REALLY REALLY bad as you can see from the photos.
